response.explain: The error message indicates that the bacon is not in the robot's inventory, so it cannot be placed on the griddle. This is because the first subtask, "Take out the bacon from the fridge", has not been completed yet.
response.subtask:
(1) Move to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take out the bacon from the fridge.
(4) Put the bacon on the griddle.
(5) Heat the griddle to cook the bacon.
response.code:
